level.heading: Liabilities of the Public Benefit Corporation.
level.text: All liabilities of the Public Benefit Corporation shall be assumed by the District of Columbia.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in ยง 7-1401.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 14-18
level.text: For D.C. Law 14-18, see notes following ยง 7-1401.
